channel.title: CVE Feed for Juniper Networks -- ScreenOS
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Juniper Networks -- ScreenOS

item.title: CVE-2018-0014|2024-09-16T16:37:27.824Z -- juniper%20networks -- screenos
item.description: Juniper Networks ScreenOS devices do not pad Ethernet packets with zeros, and thus some packets can contain fragments of system memory or data from previous packets. This issue is often detected as CVE-2003-0001. The issue affects all versions of Juniper Networks ScreenOS prior to 6.3.0r25.
